Martin KaymerIndex 6: Martin Kaymer competed in the KLM Open on 12 Sep 2010 as part of the 2010 European Tour. He won with a score of −14 (67-67-66-66=266), securing victory by a margin of 4 strokes. The runners-up were Christian Nilsson and Fabrizio Zanotti.
Martin KaymerIndex 9: On 6 Nov 2011, Martin Kaymer participated in the WGC-HSBC Champions tournament in Shanghai, China, as part of the 2011 European Tour. He achieved a winning score of −20 (69-68-68-63=268), with a victory margin of 3 strokes over runner-up Fredrik Jacobson.
Martin KaymerIndex 2: Martin Kaymer played in the Open de France ALSTOM on 5 Jul 2009 during the 2009 European Tour. He won the tournament with a score of −13 (62-72-69-68=271) after a playoff against runner-up Lee Westwood.
Martin KaymerIndex 4: Martin Kaymer competed in the Abu Dhabi Golf Championship on 24 Jan 2010, part of the 2010 European Tour held in Abu Dhabi, United Arab Emirates. He won the event with a score of −21 (67-67-67-66=267), finishing one stroke ahead of Ian Poulter.
